bibl.title: Brugte de virkelig en nål? [Utilisait-on vraiment une aiguille?]
bibl.note: Response to: Adam Lukaszewicz, Diviso acu. Was a Needle Used in Papyrus Manufacturing?, JJurP 27 (1997) pp. 61-65. - It is proposed to emend Pliny, NH XIII 74 diviso acu into diviso accurate. A needle is unsuitable for peeling off the strips from the papyrus stalk. - Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.seg: Adam Bülow-Jacobsen, Brugte de virkelig en nål? [Utilisait-on vraiment une aiguille?]

Response to: Adam Lukaszewicz, Diviso acu. Was a Needle Used in Papyrus Manufacturing?, JJurP 27 (1997) pp. 61-65. - It is proposed to emend Pliny, NH XIII 74 diviso acu into diviso accurate. A needle is unsuitable for peeling off the strips from the papyrus stalk. - Avec résumé en anglais.
